title: 8bar Kronprinz Steel v1 delivers quick, affordable modern road bike update
content:
8bar’s Kronprinz road bike is back with an all-new steel update, pairing modern geometry & standards with classic materials to create a fast, affordable bike that can take on all-day riding on all-roads. The Berlin bike company calls the new Kronprinz Steel v1 a “light and agile” bike that combines the best characteristics of their […]

The post 8bar Kronprinz Steel v1 delivers quick, affordable modern road bike update appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
